title: Boo! Tesla’s recalling a feature that made its horn sound like a fart
content:
A mere week after it was forced to slash the FSD’s rolling stop function, Tesla is recalling yet another feature of its vehicles.  This time, it’s something called Boombox that caught the eye of the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA).  What’s wrong with Boombox, you ask? I’ll allow this tweet to explain:  Change your horn sound to 🐐, 🐍🎷, 💨 or holiday jingles with latest Tesla software update! — Elon Musk (@elonmusk) December 25, 2020 Because, hell, who in their right minds would want their car to make a boring ol’ horn sound?
